remarks: Equivalent expressions for "not less than" in a lattice.  ( ~ chnle analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latnle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latnle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latnle.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
latnle.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latnle $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( -. Y .<_ X <-> X .< ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
